subject: Agents (Business)
Football
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: If life has been dizzying for Michael Sam since announcing he would try to forge an N.F.L. career as a publicly gay man, it has been no less head-spinning for the men Sam is entrusting to manage it.
snippet: If life has been dizzying for Michael Sam since announcing he would try to forge an N.F.L. career as a publicly gay man, it has been no less head-spinning for the men Sam is entrusting to manage it.
